long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Made with touch screen kiosks in mind. This extension is intended to block all touch gestures on screen. This can be helpful with chrome launched as --kiosk.

Features:
- Disables Pinch-to-Zoom
- Disables Swipe Back Navigation
- Disables scroll type swipes
- Whitelist websites and allow touch gestures

Note:
- This will not prevent you from using the scrollbar or the settings zoom
- If the X button is greyed out, that webpage has not yet been whitelisted
